message: I propose dividing the $10000 into an 80/20 split, with you receiving $2000. I believe this is fair given the inflation factor.
I'm willing to compromise on the split, but I think I deserve a slightly larger share given the inflation factor. This 60/40 split seems reasonable to me.
Considering the inflation factor, I propose a 75/25 split. This maintains a significant portion for you while accounting for the decrease in value of the money over time.

I'm starting to think you're not taking the inflation factor seriously. This 70/30 split is a fair compromise, considering the value of the money is decreasing for you, but I'm still willing to give you a decent share.
